Question: Which of the following statements are true regarding the film 'Swades'?
Options:
A. 'Swades' was filmed at NASA headquarters.
B. 'Swades' is inspired by the work of Aravinda Pillalamarri and Ravi Kuchimanchi.
C. 'Swades' is the first Indian film to be shot at NASA.
D. 'Swades' has no connection with non-resident Indians.
Answer: A) 'Swades' was filmed at NASA headquarters., B) 'Swades' is inspired by the work of Aravinda Pillalamarri and Ravi Kuchimanchi., C) 'Swades' is the first Indian film to be shot at NASA.
